column5: Where do i find the trolling motor connector plug for the boat side?? thanks
West Marine should have them. I was in Hully Gully in London and they carry them... somewhere in the $30 range for the boat side. -Brian
Ya west marine, don`t know if you have boaters world stores up there, BPS, and I think I have seen them at wal-mart stores here.
Aikmans in Mississauga will have them or any Marine dealer could order one for you.

wow.. $30? i was thinking it'd be $10-15.. for that little peice of thing eh.. i guess i'd gotta call around.. i'm guessing west marine is my best choice or even eastern marine systems (closest to my house)
